Package adp.elevation.jar

Interface Searcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSearcher, BasicSearcher
    public interface Searcher
    Interface for an object that is capable of running a search for areas of relative flatness in a raster containing elevation data by trying some number of positions in turn.

    AbstractSearcher provides a framework for implementing concrete Searcher classes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Searcher.SearchCancelledException
      An exception class that should be thrown by the runSearch(SearchListener) method if another thread invokes cancel().
      static interface  Searcher.SearchListener
      Interface for objects interested in observing the progress and results of an Searcher object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void cancel()
      When this method is called, the runSearch(SearchListener) method should throw an Searcher.SearchCancelledException as promptly as possible.
      int numberOfPositionsToTry()
      Returns the number of positions in total that this Searcher has been configured to try.
      int numberOfPositionsTriedSoFar()
      Returns the number of positions in that this Searcher has tried so far.
      void reset()
      Resets the searcher to re-run its search.
      void runSearch​(Searcher.SearchListener listener)
      Performs the search, working through the positions and issuing information about progress made to the provided SearchListener object.

    • Method Detail

        Searcher.SearchCancelledException

        Resets the searcher to re-run its search.

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        When this method is called, the runSearch(SearchListener) method should throw an Searcher.SearchCancelledException as promptly as possible.
